Package: perl-Net-SMTP-SSL

summary: Perl distribution Net-SMTP-SSL

description: Implements the same API as Net::SMTP, but uses IO::Socket::SSL for its network operations in order to support encrypted connections.

categories: Perl

source package: perl-Net-SMTP-SSL

maintainer(s): Blooey McFooey, Yaakov Selkowitz (Use the mailing list to report bugs or ask questions. Do not contact the maintainer(s) directly.)
